Either way, I'm sure you guys will all enjoy this like I did :)

BTW, if anyone has the remastered dvd of Ghost in the Shell (1995 movie) would appreciate that! ;)
Please SEED, i see about 30 peers all capped at around 85% because there's no seeder.  Please just seed for a while so the rest of us can start seeding.
OK, now i see 30 peers capped at 98.9%.  Can the uploader seed for just a little bit longer so we can continue?  Thanks

Thanks for the upload, and thanks to the people seeding the content.

I didn't watch the whole DVD yet, just the beginning. I noticed the original movie on DVD was recorded in interlaced mode. It's very noticeable during hi speed - motion blur scenes. When the DVD was shrunk, the interlaced option must have been turned off, or it was very badly de-interlaced. It doesn't bother me that much, you'll get used to it too.

The sound is gorgeous. It's only in English, but in full AC3 (dd5.1).

Overall, it's great! 9/10

It's a shame that there is NO JAPANESE AUDIO or any menus!

In other words it's a bit unnessesary to have to download 4.4gigs when you could just download a dvdrip with about the same quality in 700megs.

Anyway, thanks for uploading.

@Davidow

Dude you're kinda stupid. 700MB DVD-Rips aren't as good quality as 4.38GB disc copies. Even without the menus or Jap Audio it's worth downloading the DVD-Copy if you can and have the net speed/patience.

Sure if you're on a shitty plan with limits or whatever get the 700MB Rip.

The difference between a shitty 700MB rip is that, it will look like shit on a large TV like mine (37") where as this 4.38GB Copy will look at least, good/acceptable. The __bitrate__ difference between a shitty 700MB Rip and a 4.38GB Copy is absolutely huge. We're taking fuckloads more quality. Just because the video size is the same on both sizes doesn't mean the 700MB one is anywhere near as anamorphic or high quality.
Just what I was looking for!  Much thanks!!!
